content.p: Explain and demonstrate how to find the image of T and the kernel of T.
Explain and demonstrate how to find a basis of the image of T and a basis of the kernel of T.
Explain and demonstrate how to find the rank and nullity of T, and why the rank-nullity theorem holds for T.

outtro.p: The rank of T is {{rank}}, the nullity of T is {{nullity}}, and the dimension of the domain of T is {{columns}}. The rank-nullity theorem asserts that \mathrm{rank}+\mathrm{nullity}=\mathrm{dim}(\mathrm{dom}T), which we see to be true as {{rank}}+{{nullity}}={{columns}}.
